message: I propose dividing the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This seems fair given the risk of inflation.
I propose a 70/30 split in favor of Bob, considering the 10% inflation rate for me and 5% for you.
Considering the inflation rates, I propose an equal split of the money. This ensures fairness for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share given the higher inflation rate I'm facing. This offer is a fair middle ground.
